code: export async function fetchMenuItems(category){try{const response=await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/products/list?category=${category}`);if(!response.ok)throw new Error("Lỗi khi lấy dữ liệu menu");return await response.json();}catch(error){console.error(error);return[];}}
